DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study compare metabolic effect natural estradiol synthetic ethinylestradiol use combined oral contraception healthy woman . A progestin-only preparation use comparison . The main goal study effect glucose metabolism , coagulation marker chronic inflammation ( hs-CRP ) . Our hypothesis natural estradiol preparation influence blood glucose level , marker coagulation chronic inflammation less ethinylestradiol preparation . The progestin-only preparation effect parameter .
DOC.brief_title: Synthetic v Natural Estrogen Combined Oral Contraception
DOC.criteria: BMI 1924.9 , regular menstrual cycle ( 2135 day ) , minimum 2 month without hormonal contraceptive , contraindication use hormonal contraception Polycystic ovary , hypertension , smoking , alcohol abuse , pregnancy , lactation , abnormal result prescreening 2h oral glucose tolerance test , regular medication
